activities.name: Outcomes, Evaluation and Learning - final report
Water Quality Survey
outputs: Environmental Information at the Time of Sampling

activities.name: Vegetation Assessment - Commonwealth government methodology
outputs: Field Sheet 3 - Overstorey and Midstorey Projected Crown Cover

activities.name: Progress, Outcomes and Learning - stage report
Vegetation Assessment - Native Vegetation Condition Assessment and Monitoring (WA)
Upload of stage 1 and 2 reporting data
outputs: Upload of stage 1 and 2 reporting data

scores.description: The area of land actually revegetated with native species by the planting of seedlings, sowing of seed and managed native regeneration actions.
scores.name: areaRevegHa
scores.label: Area of revegetation works (Ha)

scores.description: The lineal length (longest axis) of waterways and coastline revegetated.
scores.name: lengthReveg
scores.label: Length (kilometres) of waterway / coastline revegetated

scores.description: The total number of seedlings planted.
scores.name: totalNumberPlanted
scores.label: Number of plants planted

scores.description: The total number of species occurrence records as an aggregate of the number of species in each revegetation activity. Individual species may be multi-counted if the same species has been planted in multiple activities.
scores.name: species
scores.label: Total No. of species occurrence records

scores.description: The number of seedlings of each species planted to establish native vegetation in revegetation sites.
scores.name: numberPlanted
scores.label: No. of plants planted by species

scores.description: The total weight of seed sown in revegetation plots.
scores.name: totalSeedSownKg
scores.label: Kilograms of seed sown

scores.description: The weight of seed of each species sown to establish native vegetation in revegetation sites.
scores.name: seedSownKg
scores.label: Kilograms of seed sown by species

scores.description: The proportional distribution of environmental benefits being delivered by revegetation activities. Individual activities may be delivering multiple benefits.
scores.name: environmentalBenefits
scores.label: Proportion of activities undertaking revegetation by environmental benefit type

scores.description: The proportional distribution of methods used for revegetation by revegetation activities. Individual activities may be applying multiple methods..
scores.name: revegMethod
scores.label: No. of activities undertaking revegetation by revegetation method

scores.description: The proportional break-down of revegetation activities contributing to landscape connectivity by connectivity category.
scores.name: connectivityIndex
scores.label: No. of activities increasing connectivity by type of connection

scores.description: Total number of plants planted which will grow to a mature height of greater than 2 metres. This does not include natural regeneration or plants established from the sowing of seed.
scores.name: numberPlanted
scores.label: No. of plants planted > 2 metres in height

scores.description: The total weight of seed collected for storage or propagation.
scores.name: totalSeedCollectedKg
scores.label: Total seed collected (Kg)

scores.description: The total number of species occurrence records as an aggregate of the number of species in each seed collection activity. Individual species may be multi-counted if seed has been collecteted from the same species in multiple activities.
scores.name: seedSourceSpecies
scores.label: Total No. of species records

scores.description: The total weight of seed collected from each recorded species.
scores.name: seedCollectedKg
scores.label: Kg of seed collected by species

scores.description: Sum of the area of land specifically recorded as having preparatory works undertaken in advance of another associated activity. Site preparation works include activities such as fencing, weed or pest treatment, drainage or soil moisture management actions, etc.
scores.name: preparationAreaTotal
scores.label: Total area prepared (Ha) for follow-up treatment actions

scores.description: Breakdown of the area prepared for a follow-up action by the type of preparation action.
scores.name: preparationAreaTotal
scores.label: Area prepared (Ha) by type of preparation works

scores.description: Count of the number of actions of each type associated with the site preparation activity.
scores.name: groundPreparationWorks
scores.label: Proportion of actions contributing to the preparation of land for subsequent actions by the type of subsequent action

scores.name: fenceCostPerKm
scores.label: Fence cost/Km

scores.name: lengthOfFence
scores.label: Length of fence (Km)

scores.description: The total number of people attending and/or participating in activities and events, across all types of activities. Individuals attending multiple activities will be counted for their attendance at each event.
scores.name: totalParticipants
scores.label: Total No. of participants

scores.description: The number of participants at activities and events who are not employed on projects. Individuals attending multiple activities will be counted for their attendance at each event.
scores.name: numberOfVolunteers
scores.label: No of volunteers

scores.description: The number of Indigenous people attending and/or participating in activities and events.
scores.name: numberOfIndigenousParticipants
scores.label: No of Indigenous participants at project events. Individuals attending multiple activities will be counted for their attendance at each event.

scores.description: The total number of unique individuals who attended at least one project event. This measure is an attempt to determine new vs repeat participation as a measure of the effectiveness of projects/programmes in reaching out and engaging with their communities.
scores.name: totalParticipantsNew
scores.label: Total No. of unique participants attending project events

scores.description: The total number of unique/individual farming entities (farm businesses)  engaged in project activities. This data may double-count entities which participate in more than one activity/event in a given project.
scores.name: numberOfFarmingEntitiesNew
scores.label: Total No. of unique farming entities engaged

scores.name: numberOfPoints
scores.label: No. of photo points

scores.name: eventTopics
scores.label: Total No. of Community Participation and Engagement events run

scores.name: eventDurationHrs
scores.label: Total amount of time (Hrs) over which events have run

scores.name: eventPurpose
scores.label: No. of activities by purpose of event

scores.name: eventPurpose
scores.label: No. of events by type of industry

scores.description: The total number of activities applying fire as a management tool. This figure may also include some activities undertaking wildfire management actions.
scores.name: areaOfFireHa
scores.label: No. of activities undertaking fire management measures

scores.description: The area of the fire ground actually burnt. This may be different to the total area managed.
scores.name: areaOfFireHa
scores.label: Burnt area (Ha)

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the number of fire management activities by the reason for using fire as a management tool. Activities may be undertaken for multiple reasons and therefore may be double-counted in the total figures. This graph should only be interpreted as a proportional breakdown.
scores.name: burnReason
scores.label: No. of activities by reason for burn

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of fire management activities undertaken by the type of fire event.
scores.name: fireEventType
scores.label: No. of activities by type of fire event

scores.description: Average effectiveness of previous treatment (% killed) as assessed from the evidence of previous treatment events during weed mapping and monitoring activities
scores.name: effectivenessOfPreviousTreatment
scores.label: Average effectiveness of Previous Treatment (% killed)

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the number of reportings of different typs of evidence of previous weed treatment actions, as noted during weed mapping and monitoring activities.
scores.name: effectivenessOfPreviousWeedTreatment
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the No. of reports of different types of previous treatment evidence

scores.description: Count of the number of weed observation, mapping and monitoring activities undertaken.
scores.name: weedObservationMonitoringDetails
scores.label: No. of activities undertaking weed monitoring

scores.description: Sum of the assessed area of all weed species reported in mapping and monitoring activities. Several species may occur on the same area of land and therefore this figure IS NOT representative of the net area of land on which weeds have been reported (ie. the total area covered by weeds)
scores.name: weedCoverHa
scores.label: Area (Ha) of weed cover monitored

scores.description: Frequency count of reported weed observation/monitoring records by different infestation status classes
scores.name: weedSpecies
scores.label: Frequency of reported weed observation/monitoring records by infestation status

scores.description: Total area of reported weed cover by species. Note that the sum of areas will likely be greater than the net total area of weed cover.
scores.name: weedCoverHa
scores.label: Total area (Ha) of reported weed cover by species

scores.description: The total area of weeds for which an initial treatment was undertaken.
scores.name: areaTreatedHa
scores.label: Total new area treated (Ha)

scores.description: Total lineal length of stream frontage and/or roadside treated for weeds.
scores.name: linearAreaTreated
scores.label: Total lineal length (Km) of stream frontage and/or roadside treated for weeds.

scores.description: Average cost per hectare of weed treatment. This is a non-mandatory field and the calculated average may be skewed by incomplete data.
scores.label: Average cost ($/Ha) of weed treatment

scores.description: The total number of occurrence records of reported weed species.
scores.name: targetSpecies
scores.label: Total No. of weed records reported

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of activities treating weeds by type of treatment
scores.name: treatmentEventType
scores.label: Proportion of activities treating weeds by type of treatment event

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of weed treatment actions undertaken by species.
scores.name: treatmentMethod
scores.label: No. of activities treating weeds by species treated

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the number of activities treating weeds by treatment method. A single activity may include multiple treatment methods being applied to different species in the activity, but for any given species the count is valid.
scores.name: treatmentObjective
scores.label: Proportion of activities treating weeds by treatment method

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of activities treating weeds by treatment objective.
scores.name: treatmentObjective
scores.label: No. of activities treating weeds by treatment objective

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of activities undertaking weed treatment by the main type of partner undertaking the action.
scores.name: partnerType
scores.label: No. of activities treating weeds by type of delivery partner

scores.description: Total area of weed treatment undertaken grouped by the main type of partner undertaking actions.
scores.name: areaTreatedHa
scores.label: Total area (Ha.) of weed treatment by main activity partner

scores.description: Total area of weed treatment undertaken grouped by the type of treatment objective.
scores.name: areaTreatedHa
scores.label: Total area (Ha.) of weed treatment by treatment objective

scores.name: areaOfStockManagementHa
scores.label: Total No. of activities undertaken involving conservation grazing

scores.name: areaOfStockManagmentHa
scores.label: Area managed with conservation grazing (Ha)

scores.name: stockManagementReason
scores.label: Proportion of activities undertaking conservation grazing by stock management reason

scores.description: The total number of activities undertaken to build/install infrastructure for the protection, enhancement or public appreciation of native species and natural environments.
scores.name: infrastructureType
scores.label: No. of activities undertaking infrastructure works

scores.description: Total number of infrastructure installations / facilities established for the protection, enhancement or public appreciation of native species and natural environments.
scores.name: noInstallationsTotal
scores.label: No. of infrastructure installations / facilities established

scores.description: Total number of infrastructure installations / facilities established for the protection, enhancement or public appreciation of native species and natural environments by the type of facility built/installed.
scores.name: noInstallations
scores.label: No. of installations by type of infrastructure

scores.category: Project Management, Planning and Research Outputs
scores.description: The total number of plans developed
scores.name: typeOfPlan
scores.label: No. of activities undertaking plan development work

scores.category: Project Management, Planning and Research Outputs
scores.description: Count of the number of plans developed which have been classified as NEW plans (ie. not revisions of existing plans).
scores.name: versionOfPlan
scores.label: No. of new plans developed

scores.category: Project Management, Planning and Research Outputs
scores.description: Total of the number of actions specified in plans which have been addressed by scheduled activities.
scores.name: noOfPlanActionsAddressed
scores.label: No. of Plan actions addressed

scores.category: Project Management, Planning and Research Outputs
scores.description: Breakdown of the number of different types of plans developed
scores.name: typeOfPlan
scores.label: No. of plan development activities by type of plan

scores.category: Project Management, Planning and Research Outputs
scores.description: The total number of research activities undertaken which have recorded data.
scores.name: typeOfResearch
scores.label: Total No. of research activities undertaken

scores.category: Project Management, Planning and Research Outputs
scores.description: Breakdown of the number of research projects by type of project
scores.name: typeOfResearch
scores.label: No. of research activities by type of research

scores.description: Simple count of the number of activities undertaking water management actions.
scores.name: isCurrentFlowNatural
scores.label: No. of water management activities implemented

scores.description: The total number of hydrological structures installed
scores.name: hydrologicalStructuresInstalled
scores.label: No. of hydrological structures installed

scores.description: The area of land actively managed with water management activities for enhanced environmental values.
scores.name: managedArea
scores.label: Area (Ha) managed for water values

scores.description: Breakdown of the area of land actively managed with water management activities by the type of environmental benefit achieved. Note that a single water management action may achieve multiple benefits and therefore this metric should only be interpreted as proportional.
scores.name: managedArea
scores.label: Proportion of area (Ha) managed by environmental benefit type

scores.description: Breakdown of the area of land actively managed with water management activities by the type of water body managed.
scores.name: managedArea
scores.label: Proportion of area (Ha) managed by type of water body

scores.description: Breakdown of the area of land actively managed with water management activities by the purpose for which water is being managed. Note that a single water management action may apply to multiple purposes and therefore this metric should only be interpreted as proportional.
scores.name: managedArea
scores.label: Proportion of area (Ha) managed by water use purpose

scores.description: Sum of the number of people who complete formal/accredited training courses.
scores.name: totalCompletingCourses
scores.label: Total No. of people completing formal training courses

scores.description: Count of the total number of activities which recorded details of individuals completing formal/accredited training courses.
scores.name: totalCompletingCourses
scores.label: No. of activities undertaken which involved formal training

scores.description: Count of the total number of formal/accredited training courses for which participation details have been recorded. Each class is counted as a a course.
scores.name: courseTitle
scores.label: No. of courses attended by project participants

scores.description: Breakdown of the total number of people who completed a formal/accredited training course by the type of course attended.
scores.name: numberCompleted
scores.label: No. completing courses by course type

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of people who completed a formal/accredited training course by standard Australian qualification level.of courses.
scores.name: numberCompleted
scores.label: No. completing courses by qualification level

scores.description: Count of the number of activities which have recorded at least one application of skills developed as a result of project participation and/or project-based formal training.
scores.name: skillsApplication
scores.label: No. of activities indicating application of enhanced skills

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the ways in which skills developed as a result of project participation have been applied. This is a count of the number of occurrences recorded for each type of application.
scores.name: skillsApplication
scores.label: Application of enhanced skills by type

scores.description: Count of the number of times a particular issue has been recorded. Activities can have multiple threats and risks.
scores.name: riskType
scores.label: No. of threat and risk issues by type of issue

scores.description: The number of activities which have recorded debris removal information.
scores.name: debrisRemovalMethod
scores.label: Total No. of debris removal activities

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of activities that have removed debris by the type of debris removed
scores.name: debrisType
scores.label: No. of activities removing debris by types of material

scores.description: Proportional distribution of the number of activities that have removed debris by the removal methods. A single activity can use multiple methods.
scores.name: debrisRemovalMethod
scores.label: No. of activities removing debris by removal method

scores.description: The area over which debris removal activities have been undertaken. Revisits to the same area will be double-counted.
scores.name: debrisActivityArea
scores.label: Area (Ha) covered by debris removal activities

scores.description: The total mass of debris removed.
scores.name: debrisWeightTonnes
scores.label: Weight of debris removed (Tonnes)

scores.description: Breakdown of the mass of debris removed by the type of debris removed
scores.name: debrisWeightTonnes
scores.label: Weight of debris removed by type of material

scores.description: The total volume of debris removed.
scores.name: debrisVolumeM3
scores.label: Volume of debris removed (m3)

scores.description: Breakdown of the mass of debris removed by the type of debris removed
scores.name: debrisVolumeM3
scores.label: Volume of debris removed by type of material

scores.description: Count of the number of activities which have implemented erosion management actions.
scores.name: erosionAreaTreated
scores.label: No. of activities undertaking erosion control works

scores.description: The total number of structures installed to to control erosion.
scores.name: erosionStructuresInstalled
scores.label: Total No. of erosion control structures installed

scores.description: Total lineal length of stream frontage and/or coastline which has been treated with erosion management actions.
scores.name: erosionLength
scores.label: Length of stream/coastline treated (Km)

scores.description: The total area of erosion treated by management actions.
scores.name: erosionAreaTreated
scores.label: Erosion area treated (Ha)

scores.description: Count of the number of activities which installed structures to control erosion by the type of structure installed.
scores.name: erosionStructuresInstalled
scores.label: No. of activities which installed erosion control structures by type of structure

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the erosion area treated by the type of erosion treated. Note that a single treatment may apply to multiple types of erosion over the same area and therefore this metric should only be interpreted as a proportional breakdown.
scores.name: erosionAreaTreated
scores.label: Proportion of erosion area treated (Ha) by the type of erosion treated

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the erosion area treated by the type of erosion management/treatment method used. Note that a single treatment may apply multiple types of methods over the same area and therefore this metric should only be interpreted as a proportional breakdown.
scores.name: erosionAreaTreated
scores.label: Proportion of erosion area treated (Ha) by the type of management method used

scores.name: structuresInstalled
scores.label: No. of activities implementing access control works

scores.name: numberOfInstallations
scores.label: Total No. of structures installed for access management

scores.name: numberOfInstallations
scores.label: Proportion of structures installed for access management by type of structure

scores.name: numberOfInstallations
scores.label: Proportion of structures installed for access management by purpose

scores.name: numberOfInstallations
scores.label: Proportion of structures installed for access management by management method

scores.description: The total number of unique/individual farming/fisher entities (farming/fishing businesses) that have made changes towards more sustainable management and primary production practices.
scores.name: totalEntitiesAdoptingChange
scores.label: Total No. of farming entities adopting sustainable practice change

scores.description: The surface area of land/water over which improved management practices have been undertaken/implemented as a result of government funded projects.
scores.name: totalChangePracticeTreatedArea
scores.label: Area of land (Ha) on which improved management practices have been implemented

scores.description: The surface area of land/water which is now managed using sustainable practices and resulting from implementation of funded projects.
scores.name: benefitAreaHa
scores.label: Area of land (Ha) changed to sustainable practices

scores.description: Breakdown of area covered by changed management practices (resulting from government funded projects) by the type of industry.
scores.name: benefitAreaHa
scores.label: Area covered by changed management practices by industry type

scores.description: Breakdown of number of farm/fisher entities adopting changed management practices (resulting from government funded projects) by the type of industry.
scores.name: entitiesAdoptingChange
scores.label: No. of farm/fisher entities adopting changed management practices by industry type

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of people influenced by changed management practices (resulting from government funded projects) by the type of industry.
scores.name: noInfluenced
scores.label: No. of people influenced by changed management practices by industry type

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of management change actions by different types of facilitation strategies used to encourage change to more sustainable management practices. Individual activities can employ multiple strategies and this result should only be interpreted as a proportional breakdown and not actual figures.
scores.name: industryType
scores.label: Proportion of actions implementing sustainable practices by type of change facilitation strategy.

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the area covered by practice changes (Ha) by the reasons for changing management practices. People can have multiple reasons for changing practices and therefore this should only be interpreted as proportional rather than actual figures.
scores.name: changePracticeTreatedArea
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the area covered by practice changes (Ha) by the reasons for changing management practices

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the number of farming/fisher entities adopting practice change by the reasons for changing management practices. People can have multiple reasons for changing practices and therefore this should only be interpreted as proportional rather than actual figures.
scores.name: entitiesAdoptingChange
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the No. of entities adopting practice change by the reasons for changing management practices

scores.description: Proportional breakdown of the number of individual people influenced by the reasons for changing management practices. People can have multiple reasons for changing practices and therefore this should only be interpreted as proportional rather than actual figures.
scores.name: noInfluenced
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the No. of people influenced by the reasons for changing management practices

scores.description: The sum of areas for each instance of each category of public good outcome recorded. Note that an activity may achieve more than one public good outcome and hence the area may be double-counted. Therefore this should be interpreted as a proportional breakdown only.
scores.name: changePracticeTreatedArea
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the area covered by practice changes by the public good outcomes from changing management practices

scores.description: Sum of the number of entities adopting practice change for each instance of each category of public good outcome recorded. Note that an activity may achieve more than one public good outcome and hence the number of entities may be double-counted. Therefore this should be interpreted as a proportional breakdown only.
scores.name: entitiesAdoptingChange
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the No. of entities adopting practice change by the public good outcomes from changing management practices

scores.description: Sum of the number of individual people influenced by the reasons for changing management practices. People can have mu for changing practices and therefore this should only be interpreted as proportional rather than actual figures.
scores.name: noInfluenced
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the No. of people influenced by the public good outcomes from changing management practices

scores.description: The sum of areas for each instance of each category of change facilitation strategy used. Note that an activity may use more than one facilitation strategy and hence the area may be double-counted. Therefore this should be interpreted as a proportional breakdown only.
scores.name: changePracticeTreatedArea
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the area covered by practice changes by the type of change facilitation strategy

scores.description: Sum of the number of entities adopting practice change for each instance of each facilitation strategy used. Note that an activity may use more than one facilitation strategy and hence the number of entities may be double-counted. Therefore this should be interpreted as a proportional breakdown only.
scores.name: entitiesAdoptingChange
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the No. of entities adopting practice change by the types of change facilitation strategies used.

scores.description: Sum of the number of individual people influenced by the strategy used to facilitate change. Multiple strategies can be used to facilitate change and therefore this should only be interpreted as proportional rather than actual figures.
scores.name: noInfluenced
scores.label: Proportional breakdown of the No. of people influenced by the change facilitation strategy

scores.description: Count of the number of activities which are undertaking pest management actions

As a single activity can apply multiple methods for different species, the activity count may include duplicates. Therefore this should only be interpreted as a proportional breakdown.

scores.description: The total number of individual pest animals killed and colonies (ants, wasps, etc.) destroyed.

scores.description: The total number of individual pest animals killed and colonies (ants, wasps, etc.) destroyed by treatment method used.

scores.description: Breakdown of the number of pest management activities undertaken by the type of partner delivering the actions.

scores.description: Total number of activities undertaken to manage diseases  (includes outbreaks as well as experimental and research purposes).
